item.description:
Have you always wanted to improve posture and balance but donâ€™t know the correct exercises to do so? Incorrect posture can lead to neck and back pain while poor balance can make you prone to unsteadiness and possible falls. Certified Yoga Instructor, Grace Furnari will teach you simple yoga poses and exercises that will help strengthen muscles and improve balance through breathing and focus. Chairs will be used to help with balance training. This is a great class for men and women alike!

Every Friday from 9:00- 10:00 am. Cost $2.00. Norwood Senior Center, 275 Prospect Street, Norwood, MA 781-762-1201. Call for details.
item.name: Yoga For Posture & Balance
